author: psmith
msg: More refactoring of the Application Preference stuff.
The state of the Toolbar and Receivers panel is now under
the control of the ApplicationPreferenceModel, with
all GUI items reacting to changes in that model. The state of visibility of these items can now be saved
Also resized the App Pref panel and got it to center on screen.

author: sdeboy
msg: Moved classes in org.apache.chainsaw.rule to org.apache.rule and updated references.
Added serialversionuid to colorrule to support versioning more gracefully.
Updated build.xml to only build rule package with chainsaw target (has ORO dependency, which the core build doesn't currently need)
